alert.note: Alert for Granville; Person; Vance (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 8:32PM EDT until May 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Person County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Vance County in central North Carolina... Northern Granville County in central North Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Virgilina, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stovall, Bethel Hill, Tungsten, Satterwhite Point Marina, Mayo Reservoir, Steele Creek Marina & Campground, Kerr Lake and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
